body: finally i can be proud to be greek

Wow.... As a Greek I'm a little flattered,impressed and a bit offended
The story is interestingly told and art is OK
Now, to clear things up:
"Greek night" is indeed a thing but such clothes? Never 
Kiss as a greeting, on the cheek, left and right 
Mykonoooooos (a Greek thing), nothing wrong there, mykonos is a very overrated island because of such stuff 
Tour guides just guide... That's all...
Overall:6.5/10 "δεν έχω λογια.."
rdddit brought me here. Fuck you NTR

"I'm sure you had a vague idea..."

Who's stupider, the wife or the husband?
This is the last place I expected to see anything related to Greece. Nice :P
